h2_title: How to Use the Five Skandhas
content: Now it's time to head back to almost where you fought the Son of Stones. We mentioned earlier the clearing with the water and the big rock with golden trees on either side. Instead of going right, where you fought the Giant Shigandang, you now want to go left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'How to Use the Five Skandhas'.
The content is as follows:
Now it's time to head back to almost where you fought the Son of Stones. We mentioned earlier the clearing with the water and the big rock with golden trees on either side. Instead of going right, where you fought the Giant Shigandang, you now want to go left.
